resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106613</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106613</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205840</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Picturing France, 1830-1900</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellen Von von Frankreich, 1830-1900</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déscription de la France, 1830-1900</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retratando France, 1830-1900</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrivere La Francia, 1830-1900</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση της Γαλλίας, 1830-1900</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Representar Francia, 1830-1900</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores 19th-century painting in France and the culture it reflects. Organized by region, the site offers a glimpse of the history and cultural life of Paris, Auvergne, Normandy, Provence, and other areas. More than 50 works are examined.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht Anstrich 19th-century in Frankreich und 
in der Kultur, die sie sich reflektiert. Organisiert durch 
Region, bietet die Site einen Blick der Geschichte und der kulturellen
Lebensdauer von Paris, von Auvergne, von Normandie, von Provence und 
von anderen Bereichen an. Mehr als 50 Arbeiten werden 
überprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore la peinture 19th-century en France et la 
culture qu'elle se reflète. Organisé par région, le site 
offre un aperçu de l'histoire et de la vie culturelle de Paris, 
d'Auvergne, de la Normandie, de la Provence, et d'autres zones. 
Plus de 50 travaux sont examinés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora a pintura 19th-century em France e na 
cultura que reflete. Organizado pela região, o local oferece um
glimpse do history e da vida cultural de Paris, de Auvergne, de 
Normandy, de Provence, e de outras áreas. Mais de 50 trabalhos 
são examinados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora la pittura 19th-century in Francia e la 
coltura che riflette. Organizzato dalla regione, il luogo offre 
un glimpse della storia e della durata culturale di Parigi, di 
Auvergne, della Normandia, della Provenza e di altre zone. Più 
di 50 impianti sono esaminati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά τη ζωγραφική 19$ος-αιώνα στη Γαλλία και τον 
πολιτισμό που απεικονίζει. Οργανωμένη από την περιοχή, η 
περιοχή προσφέρει μια αναλαμπή της ιστορίας και της πολιτιστικής 
ζωής του Παρισιού, auvergne, της Νορμανδίας, της Προβηγκίας, 
και άλλων περιοχών. Περισσότερες από 50 εργασίες 
εξετάζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora la pintura 19th-century en Francia y la 
cultura que refleja. Ordenado por la región, el sitio ofrece 
una ojeada de la historia y de la vida cultural de París, de 
Auvergne, de Normandía, de Provence, y de otras áreas. Se 
examinan más de 50 trabajos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205840</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106613</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/picturing-france-1830-1900</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
